TITLE: Dummy oxygen too high (pt).
DETAILS: The oxygen level increased above 6%. The inlet temperature and the pump were shut down for safety reasons. (pt).

TITLE: Dummy message 1 (pt).
DETAILS: Warning message that has to be acknowledged manually and contains parameter 1 (temperature): {0} {1}. (pt).

TITLE: Dummy message 2 (pt).
DETAILS: Message that is visible for short period of time. (pt).

TITLE: Dummy message 3 (pt).
DETAILS: Info message that is visible until it's acknowledged by simulator. (pt).

TITLE: Dummy message 4 (pt).
DETAILS: Error message that contains all parameters and it's acknowledged by simulator. P1 {0}{1} | P2 {2}{3} | P3 {4}{5}. (pt).

TITLE: Dummy message 5 (pt).
DETAILS: Message that is not visible in a message list but it's added to DB. (pt).

TITLE: Product temperature sensor not plugged
DETAILS: Check connection of product temperature sensor

TITLE: Product temperature sensor signal invalid
DETAILS: Product temperature sensor detected but sensor signal wrong. Measured PT1000 resistance: {0}{1}

TITLE: Product temperature sensor detected
DETAILS: Product temperature sensor was plugged in

TITLE: Product temperature exceeded
DETAILS: The measured product temperature {0}{1} was higher than {2}{3}

TITLE: Product temperature no reaction
DETAILS: The product temperature shows no reaction. The current measured product temperature is {0}{1}.

TITLE: Outlet temperature sensor not plugged
DETAILS: Check connection of outlet temperature sensor

TITLE: Outlet temperature sensor signal invalid
DETAILS: Outlet temperature sensor detected but sensor signal wrong. Measured PT1000 resistance: {0}{1}

TITLE: Outlet temperature exceeded
DETAILS: The measured outlet temperature {0}{1} was higher than {2}{3}

TITLE: Outlet temperature no reaction
DETAILS: The outlet temperature shows no reaction even if the heater is switched on. The current measured outlet temperature {0}{1}
